attributes.action: Revisit Fireworks Noise levels, Duration of use and Sale
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the sale of loud fireworks, stop the sale of fireworks before November and after December and a limited time for firing fireworks at celebrations (no later than 22H00 and not during weekdays in residential areas). Reduce the decibel limit to a max 85dB (Take into consideration a food blender is around 88dB, Garbage disposal 85dB, Rock concert 108 - 114dB. H&S recommends the use of ear protection for noise levels exceeding 85dB). Restrict the use and sale of Fireworks to under 18's to be enforceable by at least a £1000 on the spot fine to the seller and £500 the under aged purchaser. Every year Fireworks and thunder storms cause stress to the young, the elderly and animals. Fireworks are avoidable storms aren’t.
